K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-039:234b-1: a'arya aa pa ri mi ta aa yur dzny'a na n'a ma ma h'a ya na s'u tra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-039:234b-3: 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-039:234b-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-039:234b-7: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-039:234b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-039:234b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-039:234b-11: steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-039:235a-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dang @235a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-039:235a-1: ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par nges pa gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-039:235a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-039:235a-7: de dag las kyang phal cher ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-039:235a-8: dus ma yin par 'chi bar bstan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-039:235a-10: sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa de'i yon tan dang bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'bri'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-039:235a-13: klog pa nas glegs bam la bris te khyim na 'chang gi bar du byed dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-039:235a-17: phye ma rnams kyis mchod par gyur pa de dag gi tshe yongs su zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-039:235b-4: rigs kyi bu mo tshe ring por 'dod pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa de'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan tam /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-039:239b-14: aa pa ri mi ta a'a yurdzny'a na su bi ni shtsi ta te dzo r'a dz'a ya /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-039:239b-19: gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir karsha pa ni gcig sbyin pa byin na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-039:239b-20: des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin par 'gyur ro //
